email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given current market conditions, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed with the owner, and they’re willing to adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.00 is acceptable, but we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm this with the owner? Also, please send over the full vessel details and draft survey report. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the owner has agreed to the revised laycan of 15-18 October. I’ve attached the full vessel details and draft survey report for your review. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $51.00 and the agreed laycan. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any amendments needed. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
